message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SC, cs.AR, cs.NA, cs.MS

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the optimization of a gravitational octree code for GPU architectures, which is a common topic in parallel computing.
- cs.SC (Numerical Analysis) is also likely as the paper focuses on the performance evaluation of $N$-body simulations, which involves numerical methods and algorithms.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is a possible category as the paper discusses the adaptation of the code to the Volta architecture and the performance measurements on Tesla V100.
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is another possible category as the paper evaluates the performance of numerical simulations using $N$-body methods.
- cs.MS (Mathematical Software) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper discusses the implementation and optimization of a mathematical software for $N$-body simulations.
